title: Equation in Standard Form
text: Since the equation is already in standard form, we can identify the a, $$b$$, and c values based on $$a x^2+b x+c=0$$.

title: Isolating the Variable
text: Simplify the fraction and solve for the variable. What are the value(s) of the variable?
